item.title: SmartCapsLock
item.description: SmartCapsLock SmartCapsLock DON'T YOU GET ANNOYED WHEN YOU ACCIDENTALLY TYPE EVERYTHING WITH CAPS LOCK ON? SmartCapsLock lets you just select the text and press Caps Lock again to undo the mistake instead of typing everything again. Download ╲╱ Caps Lock Off. Caps Lock On. SmartCapsLock sits quietly in your menu bar and acts as an indicator always telling you if Caps Lock is on...

item.title: Show HN Karma for Hacker News
item.description: Show HN Karma is an userscript which appends the karma of HN users after their names. Installing the userscript Install an extension in your browser which lets you use userscripts: Chrome: Tampermonkey Firefox: Greasemonkey (you have to restart Firefox after installing Greasemonkey) Opera: Violentmonkey Click Show HN Karma and install the userscript. Load/reload Hacker News, you will now see the karma after usernames.

item.title: One Click Llama Button for DeviantArt
item.description: One Click Llama Button finds all deviant and group names in the page and adds a button next to them which lets you give them a Llama in just one click. Installing One Click Llama Button For Chrome/Firefox/Opera: Update your browser, if you aren't using the latest version.
